DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine efficacy Advantage Anti-Caries Varnish . Single-center , double-blind , control Phase 2 study parallel group child . Subjects stratify early childhood education center randomize receive either test varnish control varnish topically teeth . Treatment administer quarterly 24 month . The primary outcome surface-level primary molar caries increment ( d2mfs ) 24- month post baseline .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Of A PVP-I Fluoride Varnish
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : Primary - To determine Advantage Anti-Caries Varnish ( test varnish ) superior control varnish contain fluoride prevention new caries lesion . Secondary - To establish response child participant test varnish inferior control varnish
DOC.criteria: 1 . The subject 's parent legal guardian must provide sign date informed consent ( parent permission form ) . 2 . The subject 's parent legal guardian subject must willing able comply study requirement . 3 . The subject age 6084 month time enrollment . 4 . The subject must good general health evidence parent report . 1 . Known allergy iodine 2 . Known allergy seafood 3 . Known hypersensitivity fluoride varnish 4 . Diagnosis thyroid disease 5 . Chronic , prophylactic use antibiotic 6 . Treatment another investigational drug intervention within 30 day precede Baseline Visit .
